text: @DrOz 2.6 million Americans die from ALL causes each year including old age. I was confused. Did you mean it was no big deal if 2-3% of 350 million (7 million+) dying of COVID19 was no big deal or 2-3% of 76 million children (1.4 million didn’t matter? You are a monster, not a doctor.
